resource_warning_unclosed_files.impact: File handles leak in tests (but OS cleans up on process exit)
resource_warning_unclosed_files.notes: FIXED: Added explicit handler.close() before removeHandler() in setup_logging(). Modified src/precog/utils/logger.py lines 193-213 to loop through root_logger.handlers[:], check isinstance(handler, logging.FileHandler), call handler.close(), then removeHandler(). Result: 0 ResourceWarnings in 17 logger tests.

adr_non_sequential_numbering.impact: Medium (documentation consistency - ADR gaps make tracking difficult)

adr_non_sequential_numbering.notes: RECLASSIFIED from informational to actionable per user feedback 2025-11-09. While ADR gaps may be intentional, they are reported by validate_docs.py as warnings and should be addressed - either document the policy or renumber ADRs.

mypy_test_type_hints.message_pattern: [index] Value of type X is not indexable | [unreachable] Subclass cannot exist
mypy_test_type_hints.notes: FIXED: All 117 Mypy errors eliminated. Fixes applied: (1) Added None guards before indexing Optional returns, (2) Aligned TypedDict field names with Kalshi API (yes_bid_dollars vs yes_bid), (3) Added type: ignore[unreachable] for defensive isinstance checks, (4) Added external library stubs to pyproject.toml (github, vcr), (5) Removed unused type: ignore comments. Pattern 24 documented in DEVELOPMENT_PATTERNS_V1.12.md.

deferred_fixes.title: Fix ResourceWarning: unclosed file handles in logger tests
deferred_fixes.description: 13 tests create FileHandler objects that aren't explicitly closed, causing ResourceWarning
deferred_fixes.proposed_fix: Add explicit handler.close() in test teardown or refactor setup_logging to use context manager

Fixes applied: (1) Added None guards before indexing Optional returns across 15+ test files, (2) Aligned TypedDict field names with Kalshi API spec (yes_bid_dollars vs yes_bid), (3) Added type: ignore[unreachable] for defensive isinstance checks, (4) Added external library stubs to pyproject.toml (github, vcr), (5) Removed unused type: ignore comments.

warning_breakdown.notes: BASELINE UPDATE 2025-11-26: 90 → 12 warnings (-78, 87% reduction!). Previous: 429 → 312 → 32 → 68 → 70 → 90 → 12. MAJOR MILESTONE: All 117 Mypy type errors ELIMINATED. Fixes documented in Pattern 24 (DEVELOPMENT_PATTERNS_V1.12.md). CURRENT: 9 pytest dependency warnings (pytest-asyncio: 4, structlog: 1, coverage: 1, other: 3) + 0 Mypy + 0 Ruff. Remaining warnings are from external dependencies (not actionable). Target achieved: Mypy test type hints → 0.

governance_policy.notes: Baseline UPDATED 2025-11-26 (90 → 12, Mypy Warning Elimination - Session). History: 429 → 312 → 32 → 68 → 70 → 71 → 79 → 83 → 90 → 12. MAJOR MILESTONE: 87% warning reduction! Fixed all 117 Mypy type errors using Pattern 24 (Type Safety and Mypy Warning Prevention). Breakdown: pytest (9 dependency warnings) + Mypy (0) + Ruff (0) = 12 total. Investigation Issue #142 RESOLVED - root cause was type errors in test files, now fixed. Production code: 0 Mypy errors, 0 pytest warnings, 0 Ruff errors. ENFORCED in pre-push hooks via check_warning_debt.py (Step 5/7). Zero-regression policy prevents new warnings without explicit approval. Target achieved: WARN-008 (Mypy test type hints) → COMPLETED.
